mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS ( NO, BOARD_NO, WRITER_NO, CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENTS.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{writerNo}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT C.NO ,C.CONTENT ,C.BOARD_NO ,C.WRITER_NO ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.DEL_DATE ,M.NICK AS writerNick FROM COMMENTS C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.WRITER_NO = M.NO WHERE C.BOARD_NO = #{no} AND C.DEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY C.NO DESC
